It passed the House today, 231-180. Today's vote will ensure that these students can receive meaningful assistance to help them shed the debt they acquired through misrepresentation and fraud, as provided by Congress.  https://fletcher.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=2311 …

Last year, the Department of Education made it difficult for students who were victims of fraudulent practices by failed for-profit colleges to receive student debt relief, so I cosponsored the Congressional Review Act (CRA) Resolution, H.R. 76, to overturn the that rule.

Our constituent services team helped Maryanne obtain the medals her father earned in service of our country. We were honored to be able to help her.
